alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 06 at 5:54AM PST until February 07 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Mainly from Ventura through the Malibu coast to the Hollywood Hills. * WHERE...Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Roadways that may be affected by gusty cross winds include This includes Pacific Coast Highway, Highway 101, and the 10, 105, 110, 405, 605, and 710 freeways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast
